lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You have been given detention after school for a disturbance you had absolutely no part in. Mr. Black comes in and asks for "volunteers" to help him wash his car as an alternative to detention.
After you are outside you are handed a sponge and told to "get to work."
#WORK FAST AND FINISH AS QUICKLY AS POSSIBLE
#WORK SLOWLY AND DO A LOUSY JOB
You sold out, but I guess you made the best of an unpleasant situation.

Mr. Black's car is his LIFE. Your disrespect for his black and chrome "dream machine" makes him furious. There's not much he can say. After all, he said you had to come out and WASH it. He didn't say you had to do a good job.
Why should you do THEM a favor when they stick you in this dumb room for doing absolutely nothing?  You have a point there. Sometimes life isn't very fair.
